title: Clash of Clans
subtitle: Build your village, train powerful armies, and fight millions of players in Supercell’s legendary strategy game.
about:
Clash of Clans is one of the world’s most successful strategy games, combining base-building, real-time battles, hero upgrades, clan wars, and long-term progression into one addictive package. Developed by Supercell, the game lets players build and upgrade their village, train troops, unlock heroes, and battle opponents in PvP and PvE modes.

Players must manage gold, elixir, and dark elixir to strengthen defenses, unlock new troops, and improve their attacking power. Heroes like the Barbarian King, Archer Queen, Grand Warden, Royal Champion, and Battle Machine add depth, each with abilities that change attack strategies. With Clan Wars, Clan War Leagues, Clan Games, challenges, events, and Builder Base 2.0, Clash of Clans offers constant updates, balanced gameplay, and competitive action.

The game rewards strategy, planning, and teamwork. Whether you're a casual player building slowly or a competitive player grinding trophies and leagues, the game offers endless progression through Town Hall levels, new troops, new defenses, and new mechanics added yearly.
overview:
Clash of Clans centers around building your home village, defending it from raids, and launching your own attacks to gain loot. Every building, troop, and hero is part of your long-term strategy. Upgrading your Town Hall unlocks new layers of gameplay, including advanced defenses, new troops, siege machines, and hero abilities.

The game features two major modes: the Home Village and the Builder Base. Home Village focuses on strategic attacks, clan wars, farming, and trophy pushing. Builder Base (including Builder Base 2.0) offers real-time versus battles, unique troops, and powerful mechanics like the Battle Machine and Mega Mini.

Players can also join clans, participate in Clan Wars, Clan Games, and CWL (Clan War Leagues), and compete in monthly events. Supercell regularly adds new challenges, skins, magic items, hero equipment, and seasonal rewards to keep the experience fresh and competitive.
story:
Clash of Clans doesn't follow a linear story but takes place in a fantasy world filled with warriors, wizards, giants, dragons, and heroes. The lore suggests a world of magical forces, ancient kingdoms, and legendary warriors competing for resources and territory.

The Home Village represents your growing kingdom, while the Builder Base reveals a mysterious island ruled by Master Builder, who crafts unique inventions. As Supercell releases new troops, heroes, and gameplay features, the world expands with subtle storytelling through events, challenges, and character designs.

mechanics: Upgrade your Town Hall to unlock powerful defenses and new buildings
Attack other villages for loot and trophies
Train troops from multiple tiers including elixir, dark elixir, and super troops
Deploy heroes with unique abilities in battle
Strategically plan your base to defend against enemy raids
Participate in Clan Wars and Clan War Leagues
Compete in Builder Base versus battles
Unlock and upgrade siege machines for high-level attacks
Use hero equipment to boost combat power
Progress through leagues for better rewards

tips: Always upgrade offense (troops, spells, heroes) before maxing defense.
Use armies suited to your Town Hall level like BARCH, GiWi, Dragon, Hybrid, or Electro Dragons.
Save magic items for important upgrades like Town Hall, heroes, and lab.
Join an active clan to participate in Wars and Clan Games.
Plan your base with anti-3-star or anti-rush layouts depending on your goal.
Upgrade your Laboratory constantly—troop strength is everything.
Use Super Troops for powerful farming and war strategies.
Farm in lower leagues to get easy bases with high loot.
features: Massive progression system from Town Hall 1 to 17
Home Village and Builder Base gameplay
Clan Wars and Clan War Leagues competitive modes
Super Troops and siege machine strategies
Seasonal Gold Pass with skins and perks
Magic items for boosts and instant upgrades
Regular balance updates and new content
Friendly battles and live clan training
whyPlay: Clash of Clans delivers deep strategy, smart progression, and nonstop updates. Whether you enjoy building, attacking, competing, or grinding, CoC gives endless long-term goals and a thriving global community.

performance: Runs smoothly at 60 FPS on A10 chip or newer

faqs.question: Is Clash of Clans free to play?
faqs.answer: Yes, Clash of Clans is completely free with optional in-app purchases.

faqs.question: Does Clash of Clans support cross-platform?
faqs.answer: Yes, progress is synced through Supercell ID across Android and iOS.

faqs.question: How much storage does Clash of Clans require?
faqs.answer: Approximately 500MB to 1GB depending on device and updates.

faqs.question: What is the maximum Town Hall level?
faqs.answer: The current maximum Town Hall level is 17.

faqs.question: Can you play Clash of Clans on PC?
faqs.answer: Yes, using Android emulators like BlueStacks or official Google Play Games (where available).
